"Anjhadu-lili Demolition":
"In the depths of the Shironia area, the
Kuronites have summoned the Anjhadu-lili,
and it is currently rampaging in the area.
If left unchecked, it will cause massive
damage. All ARKS are to head to the
area and defeat the Anjhadu-lili at the far
end of the Shironia area.

――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Be defeated in the final area."
